Questions.Question: Which costume designer won an Oscar for 'Mad Max: Fury Road'?
Questions.Explanation: Jenny Beavan won the Academy Award for Best Costume Design in 2016 for her work on 'Mad Max: Fury Road,' known for its intricate post-apocalyptic costumes.

Questions.Question: In 'The Great Gatsby' film, who was the costume designer?
Questions.Explanation: Catherine Martin was the costume designer for 'The Great Gatsby,' creating luxurious and opulent 1920s-inspired costumes that accentuated the film's lavish setting.

Questions.Question: Which costume designer created the iconic looks in 'Black Panther'?
Questions.Explanation: Ruth E. Carter won an Oscar for Best Costume Design for her visionary work in 'Black Panther,' infusing Afrofuturism and traditional African aesthetics into the costumes.

Questions.Question: Who designed the memorable costumes for 'Alice in Wonderland' (2010)?
Questions.Explanation: Colleen Atwood's whimsical and elaborate costumes for 'Alice in Wonderland' garnered her an Oscar for Best Costume Design in 2011.

Questions.Question: Which designer created the iconic red coat in 'Schindler's List'?
Questions.Explanation: Anna B. Sheppard designed the powerful red coat in 'Schindler's List,' symbolizing the innocence amidst the brutal reality of the Holocaust.

Questions.Question: Who was the costume designer for the sets of 'The Devil Wears Prada'?
Questions.Explanation: Patricia Field's creative and high-fashion costumes in 'The Devil Wears Prada' contributed to the film's portrayal of the cutthroat world of fashion.

Questions.Question: Which designer was behind the costumes in 'The Hunger Games' films?
Questions.Explanation: Trish Summerville's innovative and dystopian costumes in 'The Hunger Games' series added depth and grit to the film's post-apocalyptic world.

Questions.Question: Who created the Victorian-era costumes in 'Crimson Peak'?
Questions.Explanation: Kate Hawley's detailed and atmospheric Victorian costumes in 'Crimson Peak' captured the gothic essence of the film's haunted setting.

Questions.Question: Which designer won an Academy Award for 'Memoirs of a Geisha'?
Questions.Explanation: Colleen Atwood's stunning period costumes for 'Memoirs of a Geisha' earned her an Oscar for Best Costume Design in 2006.

Questions.Question: Who was the costume designer for the 'Lord of the Rings' trilogy?
Questions.Explanation: Ngila Dickson's intricate and diverse costumes for 'The Lord of the Rings' were pivotal in bringing J.R.R. Tolkien's fantastical world to life.
